description: The construction of two residential blocks comprising one with part two/part three,/part four/part five and part six storeys and the second with part three/part four/part five and part six storeys both blocks incorporating balconies at former New Cross Hospital Site, Wardalls Grove, Avonley Road SE14 to provide 35 one bedroom, 64 two bedroom self-contained flats, 11 three bedroom and 14 four bedroom houses, together with associated landscaping, provision of refuse stores, 127 cycle spaces and 43 car parking spaces with access onto Avonley Road.
site_name: PART FORMER NEW CROSS HOSPITAL SITE
site_number: PART FORMER NEW CROSS HOSPITAL SITE
